text:
org.apache.catalina.ha.ClusterMessageBase is Serializable; consider declaring a serialVersionUID

Similarly for:
org.apache.catalina.ha.session.ReplicatedSession 
org.apache.catalina.ha.session.SerializablePrincipal 
org.apache.catalina.session.StandardSession 
org.apache.catalina.tribes.tipis.AbstractReplicatedMap.MapMessage
org.apache.tomcat.util.modeler.ManagedBean
creator: sebb@apache.org

text: The above list is far from complete.
creator: markt@apache.org
sebb@apache.org
text:
Indeed, but it's probably easier to use the Eclipse warnings to fix the problems directly.

But if you want me to create patches, let me know.

Created attachment 25730
A patch which add a serial version UID to all the classes where it is needed

I have added the serial version UID in all classes that are listed by eclipse in the proposed patch serialVersionUID.patch.
creator: tomcat_mailbox@yahoo.fr
markt@apache.org
text: Fixed in 7.0.x and will be included in 7.0.6 onwards.
